p: Inflammatory disorders are usually treated with steroidal anti-inflammatory drugs (SAIDs) or non-SAIDs (NSAIDs). Nevertheless, because these drugs present multiple negative side effects, it is important to assess and validate the use of other potential anti-inflammatory agents, namely, essential oils. Moreover, some of these essential oils are by-products from landscaping activities or other industries, thus constituting an added value to countriesâ€™ local flora.
